content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

###Coal Mining Setup at (-15,24)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (24.0, -15.0)
- Storage chest at (23.5, -16.5) containing coal
The drill is actively mining coal and depositing into the chest

###Copper Processing Line at (20,20)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (20.0, 20.0) mining copper ore
- Initial storage chest at (20.5, 21.5) 
- Middle transport chest at (22.5, 21.5) storing copper ore
- Stone furnace at (24.0, 20.0)
- Output chest at (24.5, 17.5) containing copper plates
- Burner inserter at (21.5, 21.5) moving ore from initial to middle chest
- Burner inserter at (23.5, 21.5) moving ore from middle chest to furnace
- Burner inserter at (24.5, 18.5) moving plates from furnace to output chest

###Iron Processing Line at (-14,23)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-14.0, 23.0) mining iron ore
- Storage chest at (-14.5, 21.5) containing iron ore
- Two stone furnaces at (-11.0, 20.0) and (-9.0, 20.0)

ERROR TIPS

###Errors with inserting items
- Before attempting to insert items (like coal for refueling), check if you have the required items in your inventory
- Keep track of inventory levels and collect more resources when running low

###Furnace Operation Issues
- Furnaces are showing "no ingredients to smelt" warnings - ensure proper item flow through inserters
- One furnace shows "furnace fuel source is full" - no need to add more fuel when at capacity

###Inserter Status Issues
- Multiple inserters showing "waiting for source items" - verify the supply chain is properly connected and source containers have items to move
